data.title: Read Bristol, VA and Virginia breaking news. Get latest news, events and information on Virginia sports, weather, entertainment and lifestyles
data.meta_description: Read the latest Bristol, VA news. Get the latest on events, sports, weather, entertainment, lifestyles and more.
data.text:
BRISTOL, Tenn.  A picturesque August morning had local cross country fans seeing a familiar sight at Saturdays 32nd Run for the Hills as Daniel Boone swept the team titles for the second straight season.

Grundy is the pick to win the three-team Black Diamond District title chase in the upcoming season.

Rye Cove is the coaches' choice to claim the Cumberland District regular season title in 2024. Eastside and resurgent J.I. Burton are among the others teams that may have something to say about that.

Patrick Henry is the preseason favorite to win the Hogoheegee District regular season title, but don't count out others, with Honaker and Rural Retreat right behind the Rebels in the voting.

There was a time in the not so distant past when some folks disparaged the Cumberland District during football season by referring to it as the Chumperland District.Not anymore.

Grand opening slated for King track complex...UVa-Wise announces 2024 Class...Stone Castle Reveal slated for Thursday...Under the Lights publishes on Aug. 31...Vols narrowly escape ETSU

Junior Jashon Taylor is a force on both sides of the line for the Tazewell Bulldogs.

BLUFF CITY, Tenn.  The sun came up again this morning for fresh-faced quarterback Peyton Lingerfelt and the Sullivan East Patriots, victims of a 53-7 loss at the hands of visiting Johnson County in a non-conference football game Friday night.

The Tre Lamb era opens at East Tennessee State in one week when Buccaneers travel to Boone to face former Southern Conference rival Appalachian State.

A majority of Southwest Virginia school systems performed better overall than state averages in Standards of Learning examinations administered at the end of the 2023-24 school year.

BLOUNTVILLE, Tenn.  A trending project to install baby drop-off boxes across the state of Tennessee may be coming to Sullivan County.

ABINGDON  Projects to improve schools remain in the works across Washington County, Virginia.

ABINGDON, Va.  Feeding Southwest Virginia has announced a new partnership with Ballad Health and the American Cancer Society to address food insecurity among cancer patients and their families in Southwest Virginia.

JOHNSON CITY, Tenn.  East Tennessee State Universitys Office of Undergraduate Admissions is hosting the Tri-Cities College Fair, an event designed for college-bound students and their families to explore higher education opportunities.

The upcoming Labor Day weekend is historically one of the busiest times of the year on Virginia roadways, so the Virginia Department of Transportation announced this week it plans to suspend many work zone operations during the period.

BRISTOL, Va.  Judging by his performance in Friday nights VHSL benefit game, Virginia High sophomore quarterback Deion Graham is more than ready for primetime.

Phil Donahue arrived before talk shows got raunchy  and paved the way for Oprah Winfrey, Steve Harvey and many other talk-show greats. Donahue, 88, died on Aug. 18.

You don't have to remember the Nixons or Watergate to read "The Mysterious Mrs. Nixon"; author Heath Hardage Lee covers everything you need inside. You'll have no trouble tucking into it.

Tennessee High allows 313 total yards in season-opening loss at Greeneville

Let us heed Pauls battlefield strategy: Wherefore take unto you the whole armor of God that you may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand (Ephesians 6:13).

Salt of the earth: Do our lives and words effectively influence the lives of others for the Savior, or do we just leave a bad taste in their mouths?

Trey Frazier had his junior season cut short by injury. He made his return on Friday, throwing for two touchdowns and running for two more to lead West Ridge to a season-opening 47-6 win over Volunteer in Blountville.

Members of the crew of the 50th running of the Santa Train will relive that historic day on Saturday.

Ashton Blair continued her strong start to the season in leading Tennessee High to a Upper Lakes Conference volleyball win at David Crockett...West Ridge dropped a Big 4 match to Dobyns-Bennett...Sullivan East and West Ridge played to a draw in girls soccer.

The Run for the Hills cross country meet at South Holston Dam on Saturday is the unofficial start of the cross country season in Northeast Tennessee and Southwest Virginia.

Check out a few predictions for the first high school football games of the season in Northeast Tennessee. Southwest Virginia begins its regular season next week.

Dobyns-Bennett is one of the largest schools in Tennessee.Being the quarterback of the football team is a big deal. Austin Sykes is just having a good time leading the Indians.
